lyric:
[by:No_Taste]
[00:00.00]Written By : Nevve, Inverness & Tails
[00:00.02]
[00:07.50]So far, what I tell myself just doesn't help me
[00:12.97]Each scar, is an artifact we can't take back
[00:18.42]Closed hearts, all my life breaks down when you can't see me
[00:23.89]Restart, can we open 'fore I fade to black
[00:28.77]
[00:29.41]Oo, I close the door on everyone except for you
[00:36.87]Show me the scars and human left
[00:40.62]It's a lonely view, help me to escape the element
[00:46.14]Nothing left to lose, let me wrap down to my skeleton
[00:50.55]
[00:50.56]Drop
[01:00.81]
[01:00.82]Skeleton
[01:09.54]Let me wrap down to my skeleton
[01:12.28]
[01:12.29]We both tried, running out the clock with other lovers
[01:18.21]But each time, they remind me why I need you more
[01:23.84]Closed eyes, how I thought by now it would be better
[01:28.90]I realized, we were doing it all wrong before
[01:34.51]
[01:34.52]Oo, I close the door on everyone except for you
[01:42.31]Show me the scars and human left
[01:46.06]It's a lonely view, help me to escape the element
[01:51.46]Nothing left to lose, let me wrap down to my skeleton
[01:56.18]
[01:56.19]Drop
[02:15.04]
[02:15.05]Let me wrap down to my skeleton
[02:26.91]Down to my skele-kele-ton
[02:29.15]
[02:40.22]Oo, I close the door on everyone except for you
[02:47.71]Show me the scars and human left
[02:51.49]It's a lonely view, help me to escape the element
[02:56.97]Nothing left to lose, let me wrap down to my skeleton
tlyric:
[by:犬牙吃货]
[00:00.00]
[00:07.50]目前为止 自我催眠毫无作用
[00:12.97]每道伤痕 是无可挽回的人为灾难
[00:18.42]紧锁心门 被你无视时生活全盘崩溃
[00:23.89]一切归零 能否重启心门 在我坠入深渊前
[00:29.41]除你以外 任何人都被我拒之门外
[00:36.87]向我袒露伤痕 呈上心脏
[00:40.62]满目孤寂 救我脱离这苦海境地
[00:46.14]无可失去 只得献上一身白骨
[00:50.56]
[01:00.82]一身白骨
[01:09.54]献上一身白骨
[01:12.29]撞过南墙 都曾盼与旧爱跨越时间相守
[01:18.21]每思及此 警示了我更渴求你的缘由
[01:23.84]闭合双眼 事已至此如何挽回
[01:28.90]幡然悔悟 过往种种皆为错误
[01:34.52]除你以外 任何人都被我拒之门外
[01:42.31]向我袒露伤痕 呈上心脏
[01:46.06]满目孤寂 救我脱离这苦海境地
[01:51.46]无可失去 只得献上一身白骨
[01:56.19]
[02:15.05]裹好一身白骨
[02:26.91]献上一身白骨
[02:40.22]除你以外 任何人都被我拒之门外
[02:47.71]向我袒露伤痕 呈上心脏
[02:51.49]满目孤寂 救我脱离这苦海境地
[02:56.97]无可失去 只得献上一身白骨
